text: Security deposit shall not exceed two months’ rent for this residential tenancy.
label: SAFE
reason: Matches MTA cap for residential deposits.
source: PRS India – Model Tenancy Act summary

text: Tenant shall pay a security deposit equal to six months’ rent for the residential premises.
label: RISKY
reason: Exceeds MTA cap of two months for residential deposits.
source: PRS India – Model Tenancy Act summary

text: Security deposit is refundable after adjusting unpaid dues; amount capped at two months' rent.
label: SAFE
reason: Complies with MTA cap; refund with due deductions.
source: PRS India – Model Tenancy Act summary

text: Security deposit is non‑refundable under any circumstances.
label: RISKY
reason: Contrary to refundable nature after deductions.
source: PRS India – Model Tenancy Act summary

text: Landlord shall refund the security deposit within 15 days of handing over vacant possession, after deductions if any.
label: SAFE
reason: Timely refund is aligned with MTA principle of refund at possession.

text: Security deposit will be refunded within six months after vacating.
label: RISKY
reason: Unduly delayed refund; MTA expects refund at possession/without undue delay.

text: This tenancy is governed by a written agreement specifying rent, term and obligations of both parties.
label: SAFE
source: PRS India – Model Tenancy Act summary

text: The parties agree that no written agreement is necessary; oral terms will suffice.
label: RISKY
reason: Contradicts MTA requirement for a written agreement.
source: PRS India – Model Tenancy Act summary

text: Landlord shall give at least 24 hours’ written notice before entering the premises, and enter only between 7am and 8pm.
label: SAFE
reason: Reasonable notice and hours protect tenant privacy.

text: Landlord may enter the premises at any time without notice for inspection.
label: RISKY

text: Landlord is responsible for structural, major and system repairs; tenant handles minor day‑to‑day upkeep.
label: SAFE
reason: Fair allocation; aligns with MTA schedules intent.

text: Tenant shall be responsible for all structural and major repairs, including roof and plumbing replacement.
label: RISKY
reason: Unfair shifting of major repairs to tenant.

text: If rent remains unpaid for over two consecutive months, landlord may seek eviction through due process.
label: SAFE
source: PRS India – Model Tenancy Act summary

text: Landlord may evict the tenant without notice at landlord’s sole discretion.
label: RISKY

text: Either party may terminate this tenancy by giving one month’s written notice or equivalent rent in lieu.
label: SAFE

text: Tenant must give three months’ notice to vacate; landlord may terminate anytime without notice.
label: RISKY

text: Rent may be revised annually by mutual written consent stated in an addendum.
label: SAFE
reason: Mutual agreement for revision is fair.

text: Rent shall increase by 20% every six months automatically, non‑negotiable.
label: RISKY

text: Subletting is prohibited without prior written consent of the landlord.
label: SAFE

text: Tenant may sublet or assign the premises without informing the landlord.
label: RISKY
reason: Unrestricted subletting contrary to typical consent requirements.

text: Tenant shall pay metered consumption charges for electricity, water and gas; landlord shall pay property taxes.
label: SAFE
reason: Fair split between usage utilities and ownership taxes.

text: Tenant shall bear all municipal property taxes and cesses.
label: RISKY
reason: Shifts owner’s statutory taxes to tenant.

text: Landlord shall not interfere with tenant’s peaceful enjoyment except as permitted by law and this agreement.
label: SAFE

text: Landlord may disconnect utilities to compel timely rent payment.
label: RISKY
reason: Self‑help remedies like utility cutoff are improper.

text: Tenant shall allow reasonable access for repairs upon 24 hours’ notice, except in emergencies.
label: SAFE

text: Tenant must allow access for viewing by prospective tenants at any time, daily.
label: RISKY

text: Any lawful deductions from the security deposit shall be itemised with supporting invoices.
label: SAFE

text: Landlord may forfeit the entire security deposit for any minor damage or delay.
label: RISKY
source: PRS India – Model Tenancy Act summary

text: Lock‑in period of six months applies to both parties; early termination entails payment of one month’s rent.
label: SAFE

text: Lock‑in period of twelve months applies only to tenant; early vacating forfeits entire deposit and three months’ rent.
label: RISKY

text: Disputes shall be referred first to the State Rent Authority / Court as per applicable law.
label: SAFE

text: All disputes shall be decided solely by the landlord; tenant waives all legal remedies.
label: RISKY

text: If the premises become uninhabitable due to fire or natural calamity not caused by tenant, rent shall abate proportionately.
label: SAFE

text: Tenant must continue paying full rent even if the premises are uninhabitable.
label: RISKY

text: Routine inspections shall be limited to once per quarter unless otherwise required for repairs.
label: SAFE

text: Inspections may be conducted daily at landlord’s discretion.
label: RISKY

text: Parties shall complete KYC and police verification as per local rules before possession.
label: SAFE

text: No tenant identity documentation will be collected or verified.
label: RISKY
reason: Avoidance of common KYC/police verification practice.

text: Possession shall be handed over upon payment of advance rent and deposit and after inventory signing.
label: SAFE

text: Tenant shall vacate immediately upon landlord’s oral request.
label: RISKY

text: Premises shall be used solely for residential purposes by the named occupants.
label: SAFE

text: Tenant may convert the premises for commercial activity without consent.
label: RISKY

text: No structural alterations without prior written consent; minor fixtures permitted subject to restoration.
label: SAFE

text: Tenant may demolish internal walls if desired without approval.
label: RISKY

text: If rent is paid after the due date, a late fee of 1% per month may be charged.
label: SAFE

text: Any rent delay shall incur a penalty of 20% per day.
label: RISKY

text: Tenant may install additional locks and will provide duplicate keys for emergencies.
label: SAFE

text: Landlord shall retain a master key and may enter at will.
label: RISKY

text: Keeping of pets is permitted subject to building by‑laws; tenant responsible for any damage.
label: SAFE

text: Pets are absolutely forbidden; violation leads to immediate eviction without process.
label: RISKY

text: Upon vacating, tenant shall return keys and restore the premises to reasonably clean condition, fair wear and tear excepted.
label: SAFE

text: Tenant must repaint and replace all fittings irrespective of condition.
label: RISKY

text: Rent shall be paid monthly in advance via bank transfer on or before the 5th day of each month.
label: SAFE

text: Rent shall be paid in cash only to the landlord’s representative without receipt.
label: RISKY

text: No interest shall accrue on the security deposit; deposit remains refundable.
label: SAFE

text: Security deposit shall accrue interest for landlord’s benefit and not returned to tenant.
label: RISKY
source: PRS India – Model Tenancy Act summary

text: Initial term shall be eleven months, renewable by mutual consent.
label: SAFE

text: Tenant commits to a five‑year fixed term with no right to terminate.
label: RISKY
